contest-event.event-date:
May 24, 1926 D Chepstow Contest
Chepstow Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
chepstow-contest
None
Castle Grounds, Chepstow, Monmouthshire Ref: Merthyr Historian, vol 18, available at Merthyr Tydfil Central Library. 22nd annual contest. Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £10, 3rd £5, 4th £3. Contest cancelled owing to General Strike.
Dec. 10, 2013, 9:36 p.m. Nov. 9, 2018, 12:25 p.m.
2 Troedyrhiw Silver Joseph Williams
